Organic Turkey

Organic Turkey

Meat and Poultry Category

Description

Celebrate your special occasions with our Organic Turkey, raised in stress-free environments to ensure the highest quality of life and meat. These turkeys feed on a 100% organic diet, free from GMOs, pesticides, and synthetic fertilizers, roaming freely in open spaces which enhances their health and the taste of the meat. Our farming practices are designed to respect the natural behavior of the turkeys, contributing to a product that is not only superior in flavor but also rich in nutrients. The dedication to organic farming methods reduces environmental impact, ensuring a sustainable choice for your family. Each turkey is hand-selected and prepared with care, offering a tender, flavorful, and moist bird every time.

Specifications

  • Weight: Ranges from 10-20 lbs to accommodate any gathering size
  • Size: Full-size, whole turkey
  • Packaging: Eco-friendly packaging that`s fully recyclable
  • Nutritional Information: High in protein, selenium, and vitamins B6 and B12

Benefits

  • Environmentally Responsible

    Supports sustainable and ethical farming practices.

  • Healthier Option

    Lower in fat and higher in important nutrients.

  • Enhanced Flavor

    Organic diet and humane conditions contribute to a superior taste.
